website_summaries.verdict: The Mavic Air is DJI's smallest, most portable drone, and is just as full-featured as its larger siblings.
cons: Real-world flight limited to about 18 minutes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! I am amazed how much power is ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! I am amazed how much power is packed in such a small drone Love all the flying modes and movie setting Best build design i have seen so far By the way everything folds and easily packs into such small case you can definitely see the time and effort they put into creating this product Only downside is the wifi connection I believe it works better in nature or the countryside where there is little to no wifi connections around, but in the city i will always lose signal at 300-500m distance Still very happy with my purchase and i would higly recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Stunning bit of kit, and worth paying for the extra batteries
customer_reviews.text: Stunning bit of kit, and worth paying for the extra batteries. WOW - just all round WOW. From my first flight to my flights today, I have just loved this drone. It is so forgiving when I lose my bearings or lose signal ... it just comes back! And the pictures and video... breathtaking, you just never expect the images to be so fantastic, especially if you are not much of a photographer! If you are thinking about a drone and cannot afford this, then wait. Save up. Sell a relative you don't like on ebay, but don't settle for less! Did I mention WOW.
customer_reviews.author: M Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent. From the moment you open the box even the packaging shows total quality, an attention to detail carried over to the whole product. The extras in this "More Combo" are worth the money. The drone is brilliant with fantastic camera quality. I don't think I could be more pleased if I had bought a winning lottery ticket (maybe the last sentence is a lie). 😁
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome. I am blown away by the quality, ease of use and stability of this drone even in high winds. makes a novice pilot look like a professional. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no skill flight - amazing videos - get lots of extra batteries
customer_reviews.text: great first drone - basically flys its self and results are stunning. Be sure to use in tripod mode for best results. I work in tv and film production and on low budget shoots I swear this little thing used correctly can replace a helicopter and crew and or 20k drone set up. 4k camera looks amazing. Only down side is a little loud and there aren't low noise blades available. you need at least 5-6 batteries tho to get anywhere near a days work from it.
customer_reviews.author: pmna

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned around 8 drones, and this one blows them all out of the water! It's definitely delicate, but the portability and video quality are second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with item Age or Support only saving grace is amazon service
customer_reviews.text: My first drone had motor problems , 2nd was 2 years old including batteries despite being new !. This was exchanged and third arrived but already 1.5 years manufacture date so worried batteries are no good. Trying to change DJI care to 3rd drone is a joke and still struggling with them to sort it so not happy. I will say amazon service has been good but product support from DJI is rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bird

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic drone that’s easy to use and a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Totally love using the Mavic Air! It’s a great drone and it’s very easy to use even for first time drone users! I do have to say I haven’t sent the drone to the distance limit but I have had some warnings of reception, I’ve been line of sight so not sure if it’s simply down to the terrain interfering or not but I’ll keep on flying. This is a great drone and so much fun to use, I would actually recommend the fly more pack as a necessity due to the short flight time from each battery though.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use, just had signal issues
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use of you have never flown a drone before. Packs down really small and comes with a very nice and high quality shoulder storage bag. I constantly had issues with the signal failing when only a short distance away. But the failsafe worked perfectly and it just flew back to the take off point. I returned my item as I am sure there were signal issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: As a serious amateur photographer, I've found it great getting into the world of aerial photography and videography. Easy to fly and very good quality all around. two things I would recommend 1) Fly more Combo 2) Learn how to manually set a camera up for correct exposure, sharpness, shutter speed, frame rate etc. Otherwise, you will just fly this in auto mode and it will look terrible.
customer_reviews.author: DDREFLOG

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my time and confidence lost so being returned ...
customer_reviews.text: Clever design but after hours spent trying to set the thing up it was obvious the drone itself wouldn't even power up. Surely this should have been discovered during testing... Waste of my time and confidence lost so being returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: P Stone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Companion!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing piece of equipment; incredibly well-built, light-weight, easy to carry, very easy to use and all the accessories really do mean you get to Fly More. Photo and video is perfect quality and completely shake-free - the gimbal counteracts all movements so everything is smooth and steady. The Quickshot functions are great too. They can take some getting used to but they are fun to use and make for some excellent shots. If you're getting serious about flying, I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this drone.
customer_reviews.author: philbeck10

customer_reviews.title: Need the missing bit for charging the RC!!!
customer_reviews.text: I communicated with them and they require you to send an email to support. They answer quick enough but no one knows what the exact name of that part and refused to give the serial number for it. The generic name they use refers to two different adapters. I need the adapter so I can use the drone. They are out of stock of that and now having a perfectly nice expensive drone that I can't use... Not cool!
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Ekermawi

customer_reviews.title: What a brilliant drone
customer_reviews.text: This was my first drone purchase. Yes, it's expensive but really it is such high quality and there are plenty of online tutorials instructing how to use it. The package arrived with everything perfectly inside. We use it in the mountains, it's actually pretty good in the wind. Only issue we had is sometimes the gimbal is a little sticky which affects the video footage. But usually after cleaning it and recalibrating it, works ok. We take it out on horseback and it's fairly robust!! We really put some time in to learn how to use it, but it was time well spent.

product_meta.title: DJI Mavic Air Drone Fly More Combo - UK Version With UK PSU, 3-Axis Gimbal and 4K Camera, 21-Minute Flight Time, 32 MP Sphere Panoramas, Foldable and Portable, SmartCapture - Arctic White
product_meta.description:
As the market leader in easy-to-fly Drones and aerial photography systems, DJI quadcopters like the Phantom are the standard in consumer drone technology. SAFETY WARNING N/A BOX CONTAINS 1 x Aircraft 1 x Remote Controller 3 x Intelligent Flight Battery 1 x Charger 1 x Power Cable 6 x Propellers (pair) 1 x Propeller Guards (set)
1 x RC Cable (lightning connector) 1 x RC Cable (micro USB connector) 1 x RC Cable (USB type-C connector) 1 x Gimbal Protector 1 x Communication Cable (USB 3.0 Type-C) 1 x USB Adapter 1 x RC Cable Slider (large) 2 x RC Cable Slider (small) 1 x Carrying Case 1 x Spare Control Sticks (pair) 1 x Battery Charging Hub 1 x Battery to Power Bank Adaptor 1 x Travel Bag See more
feature_bullets: FUNCTIONS: Easy to use, fun to fly. Mavic Air Drone has many functions such as ActiveTrack, QuickShots, SmartCapture, TapFly. The lithium batteries offer a substantial flight time of up to 21 minutes

3-AXIS GIMBAL: The Mavic Air is the most portable DJI drone to house a 3-axis mechanical gimbal, with its angular vibration range reduced to 0.005 Degree Gimbal dampeners help create even steadier shots
HIGH QUALITY: The Mavic Air shoots video at an incredible 4K 30 fps, recording at 100 Mbps to capture every second with UHD quality. It has a support for recording 1080p 120 fps for slow-motion video
GEOMETRIC ELEGANCE: Magnesium alloy brackets reinforce the seven onboard cameras, rear vents dissipate heat efficiently and the primary gimbal camera is recessed for better protection
INCLUDED IN THE COMBO: Aircraft, Remote Controller, Intelligent Flight Battery, Charger, Cables (Power, RC, USB), Propellers, Propellers Guard, Gimbal Protector, Carrying Case
